issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Add from_unixtime hive function to gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13322](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13322). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Converts the number of seconds from unix epoch (1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC) to a string representing the timestamp of that moment in the current system time zone in the format of "1970-01-01 00:00:00".

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13322?focusedCommentId=17459565) by Augusto Alves Silva (augustoasilva):*
The PR was merged to another one so this issue is closed
